data.title: Beasley Media Group Names Jayme Ribeiro Neto GSM at WLLD-FM & WYUU-FM/Tampa
data.meta_description: Jayme Ribeiro Neto Beasley Media Group announces Jayme Ribeiro Neto has been named General Sales Manager of WLLD-FM and WYUU-FM in Tampa. data.text:
Beasley Media Group announces Jayme Ribeiro Neto has been named General Sales Manager of WLLD-FM and WYUU-FM in Tampa. He will officially begin his new position on Monday, March 4th, 2024.

The sales executive most recently spent the past 17 years with Telemundo. In his new role, he will oversee the sales operations of both stations in the market.

“It’s important for Tampa Beasley to hire the best people to lead the only Multicultural Media Cluster in the Tampa Bay area,” said Vice President and Market Manager Ron deCastro. “I am excited to add Jayme as he brings a wealth of Multicultural and general market knowledge. He also is dedicated to seeking out, training, and retaining the best team in the area. We are happy to have him join such amazing brands.”

“I am thrilled to embark on this new and exciting journey with Beasley Media Group,” said Neto. “I look forward to leveraging my market experience and passion for media to contribute to the success of our clients and partners.”
